product_overview: Career Improver is a career development platform designed to help users evaluate their skills across key software engineering domains and receive tailored course recommendations to enhance their career paths.
core_goals: Enable users to register and authenticate securely with persistent sessions.
Provide comprehensive skill assessments across five domains with standardized quizzes.
Deliver personalized course recommendations based on assessment results.
Offer an intuitive and visually appealing user interface with responsive design.
Ensure data persistence and performance through localStorage utilization.
key_features: User Authentication with registration, login, protected routes, and logout.
Skill Assessment system covering Frontend Development, Backend Development, Cloud Computing, Databases, and Security with 15 questions each.
Course Catalog with filtering by skill level and searching by course title.
User Dashboard displaying progress, assessment results, and course recommendations.
Landing Home Page with navigational elements and engaging design.
Assessment flow guiding users from domain selection to quiz completion and result display.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in through secure authentication.
User accesses the dashboard after login to view progress and recommendations.
User navigates to the assessment page and selects a skill domain to test.
User completes a 15-question quiz per selected domain sequentially.
User views detailed results showing score percentage and skill classification.
User browses and searches courses relevant to their skill level on the courses page.
validation_criteria: Each skill domain assessment contains exactly 15 questions as required.

User authentication persists session data reliably in localStorage.
Course catalog filtering and search return accurate results.

Responsive UI adheres to the design guidelines with glassmorphism and orange accent usage.
